augmentation_techniques.quote: Standard but strong augmentations to prevent overfitting... I used horizontal/vertical flips + zoom (crop 384 -> resize to 512)... Mixup/Cutmix (I also disable it completely for the last 3 epochs)

primary_loss.quote: Use part of OUSM loss (without re-weighting) - https://arxiv.org/pdf/1901.07759.pdf... Sometimes Taylor Loss (+label smoothing) was better than Cross-Entropy

optimizer.quote: Adam, cosine annealing with a warmup, 16 batch size, gradient accumulation, fp16

learning_rate_schedule.quote: Adam, cosine annealing with a warmup

regularization.quote: Label smoothing (0.2 - 0.3)... Early stopping... gradient accumulation, fp16

prediction_averaging.quote: TTA gave me a stable 0.001-0.002 improvement in all experiments for both CV and LB. I used horizontal/vertical flips + zoom (crop 384 -> resize to 512)
